Class ClusterContingencyTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.clustering.ClusterContingencyTable

  • public class ClusterContingencyTable
extends Object
    Class storing the contingency table and related data on two clusterings.

    Author:
